page.title: 17THOUGHTS ABOUT MY HOME TOWN
page.content:
I live in{Waltham Abbey.}The area I live in is called{Roundhills.}I like going to the{video shop}and{chip shop- which has that lovely greasy smell! The town has a{market}every{Tuesday and{Saturday}- they have all different stalls, such as fruit; health-food; clothes;make-up, and material stalls. I like living in the Abbey and going to school. I particularly enjoy colouring patterns, Maths, and art.I am nearly 11 years old.
In Waltham Abbey, near the church, there is a{rose garden.}In this garden there are hundreds of plants, which smell particularly nice in the evening. It is a favourite place for pensioners on a sunny afternoon. The line of{Greenwich Meridian}goes through the rose gardens - its position is noted by a plaque.
